result.eng: I am planning to return to university.
result.ga: Tá sé beartaithe agam filleadh ar an ollscoil

result.ponchtml: Tá sé beartaiṫe agam filleaḋ ar an ollscoilI am planning to return to university.

result.eng: I am late each day to university.
result.ga: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.orig: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.html: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.
result.ponchtml: Bím mall 'ċuile lá ag teaċt ċuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.

result.eng: I only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.
result.ga: Níl an teach ach cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil ach fós bíonn an-mhoill orm

result.ponchtml: Níl an teaċ aċ cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil aċ fós bíonn an-ṁoill ormI only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.
